title: General
stimulusHtml:
3 points maximum

  • Orientation of axes, labels, scales, units.

  • Data points (one mistake permitted) and line drawn.

  • Determine molar concentration of potato cells. (Note: This point must be read from graph. It should fall into the range of 0.25 to 0.4M.)
descriptions:
Student response earns none of the available points.

3 points maximum

  • Orientation of axes, labels, scales, units.

  • Data points (one mistake permitted) and line drawn.

  • Determine molar concentration of potato cells. (Note: This point must be read from graph. It should fall into the range of 0.25 to 0.4M.)

Student response earns one of the available points.

3 points maximum

  • Orientation of axes, labels, scales, units.

  • Data points (one mistake permitted) and line drawn.

  • Determine molar concentration of potato cells. (Note: This point must be read from graph. It should fall into the range of 0.25 to 0.4M.)

Student response earns two of the following points.

3 points maximum

  • Orientation of axes, labels, scales, units.

  • Data points (one mistake permitted) and line drawn.

  • Determine molar concentration of potato cells. (Note: This point must be read from graph. It should fall into the range of 0.25 to 0.4M.)

Student response earns three of the available points.

3 points maximum

  • Orientation of axes, labels, scales, units.

  • Data points (one mistake permitted) and line drawn.

  • Determine molar concentration of potato cells. (Note: This point must be read from graph. It should fall into the range of 0.25 to 0.4M.)
